metadata.title: CVE-2022-23806 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Curve.IsOnCurve in crypto/elliptic in Go before 1.16.14 and 1.17.x before1.17.7 can incorrectly return true in situations with a big.Int value thatis not a valid field element.

criterions.comment: golang-go.crypto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
snapd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
lxd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
